title: DTL to ISO 8601 Date String
name: LGF_DTLToString_ISO
description:
## Short description ##

This function converts the date and time of data type DTL to the UNIX time of data type DInt. 
The timestamp is calculated in UTC. This means that the time zone is not considered.
Only times after 01/01/1990 are permitted.

input.name: date
input.description: Date to convert as DTL tag

input.name: separator
input.description: Separator between the components of the output date.

return_value.description: Output string in accordance with the ISO 8601 format.
